NAGPUR, Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Access Report: Global IT Spending in Food Delivery Marketplace 2015-2019 
About food delivery marketplace in IT spending Food delivery marketplace is an innovative business that has emerged from on-demand economy. On-demand economy is defined as a new economic activity created and facilitated by tech companies, using digital technology. This economy is growing at a significant pace, and is causing a paradigm shift in the way consumers transact and procure goods. Food delivery marketplace has gained popularity among the urban population as it offers hassle free service at the consumer's convenience. Customers can order their food online by using this service, choosing from a variety of restaurants and cuisines. Customers can pay online or via COD. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151012/275994 
Food delivery companies such as Delivery Hero, Foodpanda, TinyOwl are increasingly gaining traction among investors. Technavio expects investor funding in the food delivery market to multiply 10 times over the next 3 to 5 years. Investments in IT by these companies are predominantly for acquiring commercial off-the-shelf-technology such as hardware, software, and storage and security solutions. These investments are aimed at helping food delivery companies keep pace with their growing customer base, and to drive revenue growth by helping them understand their customers' needs and offer customized services. 
Big data analytical tools enable food delivery companies analyze data such as customers' history and preferences, which in turn allows them to offer customized services. Also, the use of predictive analytical tools improves inventory management at restaurants. 
Covered in this report This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global food delivery marketplace in IT spending for the period 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report takes into account the IT spending by food delivery companies. The food delivery marketplace players considered in the report are of two types:- -- Players delivering food from restaurants to consumers, excluding ownership of logistics -- Players delivering food from restaurants to consumers, including ownership of logistics 
The market is divided into the following segments: -- Hardware
